acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Orange County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Orange County was formed in 1741 from Spotsylvania County.
The deed books of Orange County in this collection were created by the County Court.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Deed books, 1738-1759, of Orange County Court. The deed books record the name of the grantor and grantee, the residence of both individuals and the description of property being sold or transferred. The volumes have indexes which contains the first and last names of both parties and are arranged alphabetically from A-Z. Deed Book No. 11 (1734-1760) have records of land improvement.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Orange Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records On Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia web site.
